Poio API Module - graid_graid2.py¶

This module is to create the regions of the GRAID 2.

class graid_graid2.CreateGraid2File(filepath)[source]¶

Class responsible to retrieve the graid 2 words from the Annotation Tree.

The data hierarchy set in the Annotation Tree must be the GRAID hierarchy.

Methods

create_graid2_xml()[source]¶

Creates an xml file with all the graid 2 of the Annotation Tree file.

See also

poioapi.data
Here you can find more about the data

hierarchies.
